thread.title: Matthew H

author: Matthew H
title: Matthew H
text: Driver (Steve H) called up early as he had a space and could fit me in early if it was better for me... which it was! Tyres fitted as expected and didn't take very long. A great service that I will use again and recommend to others as I was recommended by my farther! Saves getting ripped off in garages as you preselect which tyres you require! Steve was friendly and helpful, someone who you would like to be the face of your business dealing with customers .
